transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello haan ji Roshan ji.
Executive: Haan ji sir good morning.
Customer: Good morning kashu.
Executive: Main badhiya sir aap bataye.
Customer: Main bhi bilkul theek hoon aap batao.
Executive: Bas badhiya sir aapki mail aayi hui thi usi ke regarding maine aapko call kara hua tha.
Customer: Haan customer customer representative change karne ke liye.
Executive: Koi dikkat aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: Wo apni zid pe ada baitha hai keh raha hai

Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji sir hello haan aawaz kat rahi thi sir kya bola aapne?
Customer: Haan keh raha hoon to ek hi baat pe chida baitha hai ki aapko agar IndiaMART pe koi dikkat aa jaye to mere ko phone mat karna aur ye aur wo to uske baad mahine ho jate hain kabhi koi call nahi koi kuch nahi.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Chaliye koi nahi sir main change kara deta hoon.
Customer: Change kara do koi.
Executive: Koi Hindu ladka hi rakhna.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai ji.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Ji aur bataye aur koi dikkat aa rahi ho sir kisi tarah ki koi dikkat nahi yaar kaam nahi hai.
Customer: Sab dur parshan kya kahun pata nahi hamare paas kaam nahi hai ki kahan kya hai isliye bahut bura haal hai market mein bilkul kaam hi nahi hai.
Executive: Sir iska to kya hi kar sakte hain upar se hamari basic service hai.
Customer: To koi nahi fir bhi hum dekhte hain jitna ho sakta hai kuch mapping wagera kuch hai kuch requirement tha changes ka.
Executive: To wo main changes kar de raha hoon abhi aapki profile mein.
Executive: Mean while sir aap na ek bar ko catalog wagera update karvao.
Customer: Chalo main khud karta hoon hai na description bahut kam kam dale hue hain.
Executive: Description aapko dalna padega.
Customer: Yaar saale sab dala to description isi mein hai main jab change karaya tha to isne mere ko rok diya tha ki ki aap mat karo main karta hoon.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Koi nahi sir fir bhi description wagera aap ek bar ko aapne description wagera dala tha.
Customer: Rectify hai.
Executive: Karta hoon ek bar kya kya hai description.
Customer: Ek bar rectify karta hoon changes karta hoon jo changes ho sakte hain.
Executive: Bilkul sir aapka ek product hai sir.
Executive: Cyclo crank oil karke iska price 187 per bottle bottle hai.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: To iska price bottle mein hota hai box mein hota hai?
Customer: Bottle mein bottle mein hota hai single bottle aati hai na ye.
Executive: Achcha.
Executive: Aur aapka ek product hai electro jo 2.5 tablet.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Iska composition composition kya hota hai sir?
Customer: Letrozole.
Executive: Letrozole.
Executive: Ek bar spell karenge please.
Customer: L e t r o t r o z o l e z o l e theek hai iska strength kya hota hai 140 mg kitne mg ka hota hai?
Customer: 2.5 2.5 5 mg.
Executive: 2.5 to 5 mg.
Customer: Brand name kya hai available hai.
Customer: Apna hai litre kya hai yaar dekhna padega.
Customer: Ek minute.
Customer: Chalo koi nahi aap update kar dena.
Executive: Letrozole ka bata dijiye brand name bata denge to.
Customer: Main bata deta hoon brand name ek minute line pe raho.
Customer: Obigil.
Executive: Sorry?
Customer: Obigil obigil.
Executive: Ohigil.
Executive: Ek ayurvedic liver haan samajh gaya ek ayurvedic liver enzyme syrup hai.
Customer: Haan iska packing size kya hota hai 200 ml 100 ml kitne ka hota hai 200 ml ka hota hai 100 ml 200 ml.
Executive: Chaliye ye dal diya.
Executive: Ek sir ambroxol terbutaline ji guafenesin syrup hai.
Customer: Ji iska pack size kya hota hai?
Customer: 100 ml.
Executive: 100 ml aur strength kya hota hai levo plus embro plus gui 5 ml ka strength mein 1 mg 30 mg 50 mg kitna hota hai?
Customer: Wo mere ko dekh ke batana padega.
Executive: Chalo koi nahi ye aap update kar dena abhi jo main main cheeze hain update karne ka na wo main kar deta hoon.
Executive: Baki jo hai wo aap apne side se ek bari ko kar dijiyega mapping wagera to maine theek kar diya ek ambroxol hai litra dekhiye dekhiye yahan pe ye problem aati hai dekhiye aapne litrazole mein na hmm aap dekho litrazole aapne khola hai na hmm ye do jagah aa raha hai.
Executive: Achcha dekho upar upar dekho ek jagah spelling mistake hai hmm aur brand name aapne dala brand name aapne dala hai composition litras jole jole hota hai jole nahi hota hai.
Executive: Achcha chalo main ye sahi kar dunga main bola tha isliye maine bola ki ek bar dekho kimat aap pure ke pure change kar dijiye.
Executive: Ye technical cheeze hain main kar deta hoon theek hai haan haan isko update kar dijiye.
Executive: Mean while sir aapke calls percentage wagera theek hai receive wagera bhi aap theek kar rahe ho aur kahin matlab kisi tarah ki koi dikkat hai reviews wagera pe dhyan dete ho sir aap?
Customer: Reviews pe yaar dekhte hain reviews to dekhte hain lekin kya hai aapka 3.4 hai sir out of 50 percent ji to ye kafi kam hai.
Executive: Chalo ise bhi improve karte hain.
Executive: Please aap isko na thoda wo karwaiye kyunki ye reviews wagera bahut matter karta hai na kisi bhi deal mein kisi bhi review review pe karna kya hota hai reply dena review pe kya reply dena hota hai kya karna hota hai?
Customer: Review nahi reply nahi dena hota jaise man lijiye koi bhi customer se aap baat karte hain to hamara lead manager jo hai lead manager mein option aata hai ask for review.
Executive: Theek hai to aap unhe review karne ke liye bol sakte hain jo bhi aapka kam kam review ka hai jinhone aapko kam review kara hua hai.
Executive: Please ask them to correct them agar wo theek karwa sakte hain to usse thoda theek kara lijiye nahi to aur better better reviews aap leke aaiye right so that overall review hamara better dikhe aapke product mein description bahut kam kam dala hua hai kya product kya karta hai ye description nahi dala hua hai.
Customer: Ji to description aap usi basis pe daliye ga taki product ke bare mein pata chale.
Executive: Theek hai hai na jaise vitamin D3 soft gelatin plating capsule to iska aap description mein sirf composition dal diyo ye product kya karta hai wo to dalo aap.
Customer: Yaar actually hai kya na isme government ki boundation hai kaho to main dal deta hoon lekin government ki boundation hai.
Executive: Aisa boundation to iska to sir agar aapke paas mein license hai to aap bech sakte ho na.
Customer: Ji isme to drug license chahiye hota hai aapke paas mein license hai to aap to bech hi sakte ho.
Executive: Chalo aisa kar lete hain.
Executive: To please aap isko dal dijiye baki kisi tarah ki koi dikkat hoti hai to please aap mujhe batayega main aapka bhi account manager change kar raha hoon account manager change karte hi aapka waha pe LMS mein update ho jayega aapke seller channel pe update ho jayega.
Customer: Theek theek hai right uske baad main ye aapka concern close kar raha hoon to please aap feedback jarur share kijiyega.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai sir please catalog wagera please aap update kar dijiye.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Right?
Customer: Theek.
Executive: Okay sir thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to change customer representative.

- Facing issues with current IndiaMART representative.

- Expresses concern about lack of business.

- Issues with product descriptions and details.

- Low review ratings.



Resolution:

- Agreed to change the customer representative.

- Executive will make changes to profile.

- Executive will update product details.

- Executive provided guidance on improving reviews.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to update product catalog and descriptions.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- customer representative, product details, reviews, catalog, subscription
